title: Analyze Scientific Payload Data
description: After downloading data from a space telescope, a scientist needs to process and analyze it to search for exoplanets.

tasks.description: Run the raw telemetry data through a processing pipeline to calibrate it and convert it into scientifically useful units (e.g., stellar brightness).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully processes the raw data into a calibrated data set.

tasks.description: Analyze the light curves of stars in the data set, searching for the characteristic dip in brightness caused by a transiting exoplanet.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent runs a transit detection algorithm and identifies a potential exoplanet candidate.

tasks.description: Perform follow-up analysis to validate the candidate and determine the planet's size and orbital period.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent validates the candidate and calculates its key characteristics.
